org.sedml
Class ArchiveComponents

java.lang.Object
  org.sedml.ArchiveComponents

public class ArchiveComponents
extends Object

Encapsulates the contents of a MIASE archive file.

An archive file is a self contained, zipped archive containing a SED-ML file, and one or more XML based model files which are referred to by the SED-ML document.

Author:
Richard Adams

Method Detail

getModelFiles

public List<IModelContent> getModelFiles()
Gets the list of model files held by this archive. Modifying this List WILL modify the contents of the List.

Returns:
a List of model files, not null but may be empty.
